description:
We follow a three-stage branching strategy: dev, UAT, and prod. Each branch maps to its respective environment.

When code is merged, the CI pipeline runs automatically based on a YAML configuration. It installs dependencies, executes tests, builds the production artifact, creates a Docker image, and pushes it to a container registry.

The CD pipeline then deploys the image using Kubernetes deployment YAML files to the appropriate environment. UAT and Production deployments require manual approval to ensure controlled releases.

Post-deployment, we monitor logs and performance metrics using Splunk and Sentry to quickly detect and resolve issues.
key_points: CI pipeline: install, test, build, Docker image
Manual approval for UAT and Production
Post-deployment monitoring with Splunk and Sentry
